text: Next Time the Fire (, ) is a 1993 Italian-French-Swiss drama film written and directed by Fabio Carpi. The film was entered into the main competition at the 50th Venice International Film Festival. == Cast == * Jean Rochefort as Amedeo * Marie-Christine Barrault as Elena * Jacqueline Lustig as Gloria * Lidija Kozlovic as Diana * Lila Kedrova as The Mother ==See also == * List of Italian films of 1993 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Films directed by Fabio Carpi Category:1993 drama films
